website_summaries.verdict: Assemble this sophisticated office chair in just 15 minutes.
pros: Lean back, relax and open your favorite pages while sitting in this supple chair that's fit for an office or den
Engineered to function in your home, including a foot rests that won't scratch your floor
cons: While this chair does recline, the height cannot be adjusted

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for limited space, but low
customer_reviews.text: This works in our small Adirondack cabin. Only problem was it was uncomfortably low for me. So I made this 3" stand upon which sits the pedestal. Works for me. Just ordered another chair for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: E. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: the mechanism they have for the reclining feature is pretty hard to use
customer_reviews.text: There is barely any cushioning in this product, when you sit on it you can feel the hard metal bars. In addition, the mechanism they have for the reclining feature is pretty hard to use. The reclining feature on the chair is based on loosening and tightening a plastic screw that can hurt your hands to turn it tightly for the chair to remain in a specific position. Unless you are all forearms and finger strength this chair is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Zaify

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this chair, should have realized for the price it would not be too good. The chair is low to the ground and extremely hard to get out of. The reclining mechanism noes not work well so I am constantly looking for something to grab onto to help me get out of the recline position. I wish I had done some more research before purchasing this chair. Its all assembled now, too late to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations. I ordered this product on the 13th and it arrived on the 15th. PACKAGING...... one of the best packing jobs I have ever seen. Every item was individually wrapped in protective foam and there was absolutely no scratches, dings, dents, or damage whatsoever. ASSEMBLY..... all parts were marked correctly and they even included a small wrench and 2 different size Allen wrenches. The instruction sheet was well written and easy to follow. Total time for assembly was less then 1 hour (including bathroom & coffee breaks). QUALITY.... very good quality item, especially for the price. It is very comfortable to sit in. CONCLUSION..... I am extremely satisfied and happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur M.

customer_reviews.title: Decent for a cheap chair.
customer_reviews.text: The chair is pretty good overall for a nice cheap chair just has some minor issues. PRO: -Cheap -Easy to setup -Comfortable I'm 6'1 200lbs CON: -Chair will slide back into recline mode no matter how much you tighten the knob to keep it straight up. -have to use use a pillow for the back, the back rest can get quite uncomfortable after a few uses, you can feel the metal bar in it. I've seen reviews where people complain of smell, there's just that new chair smell when you open the box other than that no smell at all. Product looks exactly like photo.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Uher

customer_reviews.title: painful to my bony bottom
customer_reviews.text: Bough used to save money and everything was there unless stuff inside seat was messed up. very uncomfortable. Tried for 2 months by putting amazon envelops inside to try and help but no use.
customer_reviews.author: cfw1970

customer_reviews.title: These chairs are great, particularly when considering the price
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are great, particularly when considering the price. The design is exactly what it needs to be. Very simple to assemble. These are a bit lower to the ground than I expected, but that's fine. It reclines as far as I need. There are 2 weak points. Normally these might take away a star, but the price makes up for it. The recliner screw-clamp could be slightly bigger, or something, so you can apply more torque. I purchased additional lower lumbar support, a memory foam strap deal.
customer_reviews.author: XP User

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chair Oct 2019 for $137. It ships free to APO (overseas) which is awesome that alone would cost $50. Package was about 45lbs, box arrived in surprisingly good condition. Inside all items were wrapped and packaged well. No missing parts and I had instructions (which you dont really need). Great chair, only complaint is after a while you can feel the bar going horizontally across the mid back, not a thick enough cushion to cover it. I bought a seat back cushion separately to act as additional padding. I weigh 180lbs and am 5'9, holds up fine. Overall 4 stars, cant beat the value.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaddict

customer_reviews.title: Over reclines
customer_reviews.text: When you sit on the front edge of the chair it will do a reverse recline, meaning that. the hinge point will move past center and then the chair gets stuck in an unusable position. It takes a lot of effort to put the chair back where it goes. You have to stand on the hinge point or dismantle it. After two months of light use it's going to the thrift store.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Broderick

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of how this would be since it's so cheap, but I am definitely surprised! It was very simple to put together, just 10 screws total! It came in a very large box but everything fit nicely and was easy to unbox. The chair is very comfortable and strong. The ottoman is great for sitting on or putting your feet up. The chair reclines with a knob on the side and is very easy to move. I'm very happy with this chair so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kpow2630

customer_reviews.title: Amazing recliner!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great recliner! It is sturdy, comfortable, very sleek. I have resisted buying a recliner because I have a small apartment. This recliner is so sleek and takes up very little space. I love it. I purchased 2 to create a home theater seating area. I purchased the ivory color you can see in the photos. I also purchased the burgundy color. It reclines easily into various levels of comfort!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good works wekk just got it we will see how it lasts.
customer_reviews.text: It took me 45 minutes to assemble and the final product looks good. The screws that connect the sitting part to the back look like the nuts, they cannot be tightened but get some extra tools and force them to tighten. I have not used it much since it is for vacation home but it is normal that after some years of use the vinyl will peel and the cushioning will give .But for that price it is great. The one that this chair replaced was 400 bucks and it fell apart in 7 years so if this chair lasts another 7 I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality and manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: The fabric on set is not leather, it is man-made. Worse, the holes on framing are not drilled but punched. Thus the screws did not line up with the tapes on back panel. I spent about three hours using different tools and drill to make necessary alignment to secure the back panel to frame. I was thinking to return the set but I was too far in the assembly and packaging is so impact that I did not believe that I could put it back in the same box that it came with. For sure, I would have returned it if it was a local vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Abbas M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair
customer_reviews.text: The assembly is pretty straightforward until the arm rails connect the seat and back cushions. This requires either a second person or ingenuitive grasping to align the bolts and guides. I'm 5'10" and the chair is almost to low slung. I suggest anyone taller use a chair that seats higher.
customer_reviews.author: Rhett B Butler

customer_reviews.title: I love this chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! I've been using it every day for about 8 months now and it's holding up perfectly, I don't notice any wear and tear at all. It took maybe 30 minutes or less to assemble, and was easy to do on my own. the material feels great and doesn't have the vinyl feeling of some cheap leathers. It's very sturdy, doesn't wobble or creak at all. Compared to the price you'd pay for a similar chair at a traditional furniture place, this is a steal
customer_reviews.author: Joe H

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable back support but easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This chair takes about 20 minutes to unpack and put together, no issue there. The seat cushion I would say is bearable but the back really needs some more padding. If you are above 5' 6" and looking for comfortable back support, you most likely need to look into a back rest cushion of some kind.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lee

customer_reviews.title: so relaxing
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble and comfortable. I still use a small pillow for my lower back. While having a sit, I had not intedned to nap here but the full recline got me in a moment of weakness. The footrest holds when my girl (less than 120lb) sits on it. the only thing I wish was it rocked more and had an adjustable height for both the legs and seat but overall pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little chair. Seems to be pretty sturdy. I weigh 250 and it hold my widebody pretty well. Really nice material. It says leather so I'm assuming that's what it is. Really soft really nice looking and durable. Looks to be suited really more for an office type situation but for an extra seat around the house that reclines it's nice to have. Pretty well worth the money I think.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Truly a comfy chair!  Doesn't really fit a desk.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's apartment so that he could use it at his desk and then swivel around to watch TV. Unfortunately it did not work as well as we hoped with the desk, as some reviewers had already stated. It's a bit too loungy and doesn't sit up far enough or go up underneath the desk very well. But for just tv viewing or gaming it would be perfect! So comfy and easy to maneuver around in while sitting. I gave it 5 stars for that reason, not because he ended up not being able to use it the way he wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to sit and recline
customer_reviews.text: we bought these chairs for our 5th wheel and are very happy with every aspect. The overall size was a deciding factor in this purchase. My husband was feeling ill one night and spent most of the night reclined, sleeping on the chair... that says a lot about the comfort. Definitely recommend these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Bradford

customer_reviews.title: I am sitting in it with my glass of wine and am so happy. It's comfortable and compact so with its white ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a life changing chair. I am sitting in it with my glass of wine and am so happy. It's comfortable and compact so with its white painter's cloth over it, it looks super cute. Can't beat it for the price. It's also easy to get in and out of. I don't have mobility issues but I can see how if you do sliding the little ottoman is much better than kicking in to an easy chair. You can lean back and recline, too. And here comes my cat Layla to sit with me!😁
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, took a bit of time to put together but well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the chair I was looking for. Took a little bit of time to put together (although probably could have had it done in about an hour) and at one point had a bit of a problem screwing in the arm rests (just seemed oddly designed for the way it was constructed) but once that was passed, it was great. Really comfortable chair and am really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Gundrum

customer_reviews.title: Poor welding in base.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice chair, but it apparently has a manufacturing weakness. Like another reviewer, I also experienced the welds on the bottom ring failing. Mine did last longer, however, and it is out of warranty. I wish the manufacturer would contact me, because I would like to buy just the bottom ring for my otherwise useful chair. Those welds should have lasted many years, not just four.
customer_reviews.author: RLS in Houston

customer_reviews.title: This was a very nice surprise! This is actually very comfortable and looks ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nice surprise! This is actually very comfortable and looks great. For the price i had very low expectations but this really exceeded them. I am so glad I bought it and I would definately buy it again. It probably wouldnt hold up to a very obese person sitting in it every day for a year or small children jumping on it and spinning it. But it is a great chair at a great price and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Smaller sized chair great fit - not to durable for daily use
customer_reviews.text: The hubby loves it. Nice smaller sized chair. Very comfy I use it quite often when he’s not around. ***** edited, removed two stars for durability and long term comfort ***** We’ve had this chair for over a year now and it’s ready to be thrown out. It’s peeling all over and thehubby started using towels as cushioning to make it more comfortable awhile ago. Sad it didn’t last longer.
customer_reviews.author: kimemeki

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Attractive
customer_reviews.text: I have a small apt and I was sitting on a card table chair while I looked at tv. It took me a while but, I decided on this chair for a few reasons. It’s not bulky, the back is adjustable and the ottoman for my feet. This chair is one of the many good finds on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Difficult customer service from manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: The ottoman has a small tear in it. I contacted the manufacturer and they said send them the order number and a picture of the tear. I did now they want a receipt for it....well I bought it on Amazon so I don't have a receipt.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Richards

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, Stylish, Decent Reading Chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair supports me well, but could be more comfortable. In any event, I have spent many hours sitting in this chair and will continue to do so for as long as it supports me effectively. It’s a decent reading chair.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Darrow

customer_reviews.title: Good chair fir the price.
customer_reviews.text: Not leather! Easily put together...I did it in less than 20 minutes, and I have only one arm. DOES NOT AUTOMATICALLY RECLINE as many reviews state. Perhaps they failed to completely tighten all bolts. Mildly comfortable, with the exception of
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My chair came in pretty quickly. The chair itself is really comfortable. I wish it were about an inch or two higher, but not a big deal for me me. The reason why I gave it a 4 star is because the directions were annoying because none of the screws are labeled and all thrown into one bag, but other than that it was pretty easy to put together. I would reccomend and I would buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Nola

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: For an inexpensive piece of furniture, this set is very comfortable! We have a small living room, so this recliner doesn't take as much space as a regular stuffed recliner. We love the color too.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Is this chair right for someone with back issues?
customer_reviews.text: Lumbar support is sketchy. Chair back is too low to support average size man. I am 5'9" and it doesn't support my neck. I have cervical spine problems and this chair won't help with that. I would only recommend for someone who just needs a comfortable chair and is on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Bill C

customer_reviews.title: Great for a few weeks. Then legs get blood flow loss after padding settles.
customer_reviews.text: The padding holds up for a few weeks and is really comfortable at that time. But then you begin to feel the bars under it. There is no support directly below the seat. Only a square box around it where the cushion 'hangs on'. So the center will sag in the middle over time. The front cross bar of the seat can be felt just above your knee's. It often cuts blood flow and I'm not a heavy person at all. I could imagine it being much worse for someone who is 170lbs+ Might be a really bad choice for blood clot issues if that's been a problem for you in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: So uncomfortable I couldn’t give it away!
customer_reviews.text: No good. Parts all cheaply made simp it constantly fell apart. If it meant the floor or that chair the floor was a 1000 times more comfortable. You feel no cusion just all the bars
customer_reviews.author: Coolmodine

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly. Not thrilled with the color. It a bit retro looking bit maybe that is the intent. Husband says its comfortable and he's happy with it which I guess counts since it was for him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than my expensive recliner
customer_reviews.text: like I said its more comfortable than my expensive recliner. I had it for a month now and I love it, I was afraid of it being cheaper than most recliners but Im more than satisfied, highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: jonathan olarti

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chair
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the chair for very long but it was easy to assemble and it is very comfortable considering how inexpensive it was. I wanted a chair that wasn't big and bulky but still comfortable to sit in and this fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Spectre

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair.
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this chair looks and feels! It’s light enough that I can slide it around to different parts of the room. Very, very comfortable! Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: sandra a fava

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough to put together
customer_reviews.text: A real bargain piece of furniture. Easy enough to put together, even comes with the wrenches necessary to assemble it. Takes about 15 minutes to assemble. Not a million parts like I anticipated, simply bases, arms and seat. Not a high quality piece but exactly what it should be for the price. It is fairly comfortable and not a gigantic back, so, if you are a woman, it fits, some are too big for women. Cleans up easily. If you are looking for a black Pleather chair that is good for an apartment, summer home, or a dorm, this is perfect for you!!
customer_reviews.author: plumbergirlisme

customer_reviews.title: frame snapped in less then a year
customer_reviews.text: I had a chair just like this once before and it lasted 5 years. This one broke on me in less then 1 year. Went in trash this weekend frame snapped.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: Much more assembly than I was expecting and the entire chair has very little padding. I’m only 190 lbs and there is no way a 300 lb person as advertised would be comfortable on this chair. Very disappointing after your description is the exact opposite in the add. Would not buy again even at 1/2 price
customer_reviews.author: BillyT

customer_reviews.title: The Lazy Days of Summer
customer_reviews.text: Finally, out of the couch into a soft recliner with legs to rest on. This chair is nice to have around, because it doesn’t take up to much space and more easy to assemble with one’s own tools. The screw number 13 tends to be able to screw in but doesn’t screw completely and the reason could be when the recliner reclines it need to slide back and forward. Moreover, have a lazy free day with the Flash furniture-recliner.
customer_reviews.author: Rogers

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little chair for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little chair for the price. Like most things you buy today, it does have a strong chemical odor when you unwrap it. I am very sensitive to these smells. But don't let that scare you away. Just set it in a shed or a garage or basement for a few weeks and it will go away. I now have mine in my bedroom with no problems. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: emisher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for my cougar
customer_reviews.text: This chair is everything the reviews said and more it is comfortable as an office chair you would sit in all day but looks fantastic at the foot of the bed I reviewed it in about 36 hours after I ordered it thanks
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought for elderly woman. She uses it daily and love it. I took a night stand out and put this chair in its place. Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Watson

customer_reviews.title: Good chair but too low
customer_reviews.text: Chair is comfortable once you are in it, however it is too low and is uncomfortable when sitting down for an old guy like me, and also difficult to get out of. Would be great if it were just a little higher which would be an easy fix for the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price with free ship to Hawaii
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my studio apartment. Took 15 minutes to assemble. Very comfortable. Every day user for reading and tv watching. I had to give this one away when I moved back to the mainland. I purchased another 2 years ago and I wore out the vinyl in my head spot using it every day, so many times I fell a asleep at night and woke up in the morning. It's that comfortable. I just purchased the 3rd one and plan to put a cover on the back to protect it. With the first 2 I never had a problem with the structure, bolts never worked loose , always swiveled and reclined. Exceptional value.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Zrinszki

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and a breeze to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This was the easiest chair I have ever assembled, it took all of 20 minuets. It goes a lot better if you use a socket set. I’m tempted to give it 5 stars for comfort but the back rest is just a bit short and I’m only 5’10”. Other than that it is well built and very comfortable to sit in for long periods of time. The foot rest is a perfect heightened
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’8”, 185lbs, and I enjoy the comfort of this recliner. I cannot be too rough with it....ie, no gymnastics on it...its kind of not super heavy duty, so one needs to be gentle when sitting in it.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Tricky to assemble but once it's put together, it's really comfortable. After a long day, I can relax on this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny M

customer_reviews.title: Cat and kid approved
customer_reviews.text: Great for price. Good height for using as a gaming chair but too low for use with a desk. The ottoman is a good addition for resting feet. It arrived late / after xmas. That is ok. Son likes it and cat seems to like it as much as the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Tlo, Mom of 2 boys

customer_reviews.title: in less than 2 years the base broke for the chair, waiting for warranty replacement.
customer_reviews.text: The base broke, It is still under warranty for non-moving parts, the base is a non-moving part, have contacted Flash Furniture requesting a replacement base, will report on how they respond, could change the number of stars obviously.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: We just needed an inexpensive chair for watching TV occasionally in a short-term rental. We've had them for a couple of weeks and are very pleased with them. Neither of us is very large, though not light weight. We read reviews and were prepared to need some cushions fairly quickly. So far no need. Well worth the low price. So glad we did not pay 4 figures for something of higher quality (all that was available locally).
customer_reviews.author: Robin Gaither

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: i was kind of scared by some of the reviews i read here so i was nicely surprised when the chair showed up. not too difficult to assemble. nothing made on the cheap. it's a little smaller than the chair it is replacing, but i'm not a big guy, so it's fine. it looks like it should last quite a few years, as long as the cats don't use the back of it for a scratching post as they did with the last one. but that one had a fabric back that enticed them to scratch. this one had the same faux leather on the back so here's hoping!
customer_reviews.author: S. K.

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice little chair. The only issue other than poor packaging is that the backrest does not correctly lock into position. A knob tightens the back into place but any real pressure and the chair unlocks and slides back. Feels like if I turn the knob any tighter it will break. Also, do to poor packaging, my chair has a permanent indentation on the left armrest. I'm trying to ignore it but its right where my elbow belongs.
customer_reviews.author: Heathen

customer_reviews.title: Great return on a good recliner
customer_reviews.text: I should have looked at the Amazon photo more closely. I would have seen that this recliner is smaller than others in its class. I, six feet, two inches, fell off it the first time I sat in it. The chair was well-made, using good materials. I wish that it had "fit" me. The company was entirely gracious in accepting my return. I would do business with them again.
customer_reviews.author: JFW

customer_reviews.title: Needs more padding
customer_reviews.text: The quality and material feel nice but the chair is just to thin. You can feel the bar support go right across your back when sitting in it. It really needs more cushion in both the seat and back. Its also kinda small. The price was great but I wish I would have gotten something different.
customer_reviews.author: west

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable small person chair
customer_reviews.text: If this were a $500 chair it would get one star, but as a $100 chair it is a good value. This is a comfortable small-person chair. It is on the small side and it is made with cheap materials, but it is surprisingly comfortable. It would probably not stand up to abuse or to frequent use by heavy individuals. There is already a little stuffing coming out of one arm. This is certainly not a living room show piece, but as a cheap but comfortable chair to own for awhile, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: pal

customer_reviews.title: THIS A REALLY SMALL CHAIR
customer_reviews.text: Beware. this is a small chair and sits close to floor.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I liked the easy assembly. Great look and comfortable. It was a replacement chair for my husband’s old chair.
customer_reviews.author: B. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Really nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a smaller size chair. What my mother would call a "ladies chair." It's a perfect fit! Getting the pads on the arms was a little tough, but other than that assembly was easy. Love that it swivels and has the foot stool too. The leather is soft and not terribly thin as I feared due to being inexpensive. It was well packaged for fast shipping. All in all I'm very happy with my purchase and would recommend this chair and this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my nephew. He is 6'2" and about 225 lbs. This chair did not last 1 year!
customer_reviews.author: laura cunningham

customer_reviews.title: The leather diapers on the bases do come off!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my camper to replace a uncomfortable pull out couch and love them. The were pretty simple to put together, but when I pulled the pieces out of the box both bases were wrapped in the same leather, which the picture shows. This material was just elastic on and I pulled it off before putting the chairs together. It looks so much more stylish without this material on the bases.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High value lounger.
customer_reviews.text: High value lounger. Assembles trivially, looks good, compact yet sits well for reading or chat. You could spend three-times as much and get less.
customer_reviews.author: sixpackman

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: The faux leather is paper thin will tear if you look it at wrong, cheap single stitched threading starts to unravel in places, overall this is garbage for the price. Should be $30 tops.
customer_reviews.author: Banana Gibson

customer_reviews.title: No Padding
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately the seat and back have zippers because they have little to no padding. I added 2" foam in both and now the chair is comfortable. Not east to do but well worth fixing.
customer_reviews.author: Windjammer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: Quick assembly, but basically a cheap chair. Not the worst but definitely not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Sparticus Rex

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but depending of the height of table it ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but depending of the height of table it may not work well. You are not able to adjust the height and it has no wheels so it could've been better.
customer_reviews.author: Jisseidy Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for the price
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews here I was hesitant to order this chair, but I'm glad I did. I've had the chair for over a few months and it has held up amazingly. Mind you, I am not a big person. I am 5'9" and weigh about 145. The chair has ample amounts of padding for me, and I often find myself nodding off in it. But I can see if you were a person of more stature, that this chair might not be the best fit for you. I love it, the quality is nice and you can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: David Bates

customer_reviews.title: Chair sits extra low to the ground and does not raise/lower
customer_reviews.text: I was all set to give this 5 stars. This chair is nice for the price, and is comfortable. But,it is particularly low to the ground. I assumed it would raise up, but it does not. Its too low for an older person. If you're fine with a short chair, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: melinda

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable chair. The only problem I have with it is when in the full upright position it still has you reclining back slightly. But so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: bancmnod

customer_reviews.title: Like everything about this chair
customer_reviews.text: Like everything about this chair, easy setup, feels good, but the chair sits very low, would be nice if the chair could be raised, that is the only reason I gave it a 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The chair is comfortable enough for the price
customer_reviews.text: The chair is comfortable enough for the price. I'm just about 6'3 and it's a little small for me, but almost everything is. I will say this USPS refused to deliver this chair to my house. I took the day off to be there for the delivery and it never came. I called their office and they said "that's a two person package, you'll have to come to our office and pick it up". I went there to pick it up and let my 8 year old put it in the trunk of my car.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff-S

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Great Price
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our RV. It fits perfectly and is very comfortable. Just what we were looking for a smaller space
customer_reviews.author: Sski Tuc

customer_reviews.title: Fit for the job
customer_reviews.text: bought it for my mother as a lounge chair , its not bad but the supoort in back and neck is needed ordered a neck pillow lets see how that works, the ottomon is a bit too hight
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: I took the covers off of the bases, same black finish, much more attractive. Very comfortable, I'm 5'3" and most recliners are for taller people-my feet even touch the floor. Perfect for smaller rooms, very easy to move to clean under . It swivels too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble but agree about the uncomfortable bar.
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty simple to put together - I did it by myself - but I'll agree that there's a bar running across the back that's slightly noticeable and gets a bit uncomfortable after long periods of sitting. It also doesn't go back and forth as easily as I'd like: you need to put a little weight into it to recline or retract as needed. But for the money and when not sitting for long periods of time it's pretty good. Overall I don't regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steven R.

customer_reviews.title: Great chair and ottoman for the price!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this chair and ottoman are great. The only reason I didn't give it five stars is because my husband thought the leather looked a little to "fake." Well, it IS fake but it doesn't have that rubbery or shiny "fakey" look to me. I think we were just so used to the real leather chair and ottoman we replaced. Anywhoo! It was easy to put together, looks great, and feels comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JasonAndAdriana

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble, comfortable, adjustable and is a perfect size for my studio
customer_reviews.author: Adam Pietrafesa

customer_reviews.title: Good Chair for the Price
customer_reviews.text: First, let's make this perfectly clear. This chair is not height adjustable. It's permanent height is shorter than most office chairs. I do like this chair, however, so I'll make a platform of some sort to set it on. Also, no wheels, so if you scoot all over your office, you might keep looking. That being said, it's easy to assemble and very comfortable. It's nice to able to finish out my lunch hour stacking a few Zs.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Chair for RV
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased our second pair of these chairs for our 5th wheel RV. The first pair we bought were sold with the RV. These chairs are comfortable, easy to move and take up a lot less space as compared to the recliners they replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: Fits in a bedroom.
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this purchase. For $150 it's all good.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: My son is using this chair at college, he brought it home and is using it here! It has held up well and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Giggles

customer_reviews.title: I love this chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. It is perfect for the small space in which it resides. For me it is very comfortable and fits my contours. It is suited to a slender to medium person up to maybe 5'9". The reclining function works well, and the ottoman is at a comfortable height and angle. The chair arrived in perfect condition, packaged flat, but easy enough to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P. Alston

customer_reviews.title: Trendy, modern and super comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This product greatly exceeded my expectations. Because it was listed at such an affordable price I didn't expect it to be so chic and comfortable enough to sleep in!! Great, great investment. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Juah

customer_reviews.title: It's 3/4 the size it ought to be. No ...
customer_reviews.text: It's 3/4 the size it ought to be. No one taller than 5' 5" should attempt sitting in this chair. It is NOT leather. The quality and ease of assembly is a selling point. But unless this is going in a preteen or child's room, thumbs down. (I am 5' 3" and I'm ok sitting in it, but my rootmmate says the chair is tiny
customer_reviews.author: Beatrix Kiddo

customer_reviews.title: Compact yet very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have a rather small living room and the main wall is completely filled with a large leather couch and two end tables. I needed at least one more chair for the room, and this fits perfectly. Also, it reclines allowing you to lean back while placing your feet on the ottoman, for total relaxation. I have a friend who is 6.5 and about 200 lbs who has used this chair and finds it very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: canness

customer_reviews.title: Decent chair, decent price.
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought the package this chair arrived in was missing some pieces and thought very poorly of this product. After a wasted trip to the hardware store, I finally realized that some of the bolts and screws were actually in the chair itself, and not all packaged together separately. Now that it is assembled I find I bought a chair of about average comfort at a price I was comfortable with. I wish the chair was a bit higher or was able to lift and descend. The shipping arrived a day early vs the estimated date thus making it true next day delivery.
customer_reviews.author: F. Lastname

customer_reviews.title: ... chair for almost 5 weeks now and it is awesome. I like the high back because it gives ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this chair for almost 5 weeks now and it is awesome. I like the high back because it gives your head support. I am a 5"10" male and weigh 255 lbs. There have been no issues with this chair. I am also over 65 years old and have no problems getting in or out of this chair. I am getting ready to buy one for my wife. She is 5'3" and loves this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Shawvan

customer_reviews.title: When you have young kids and animals, this is the kind of chair you want until life changes.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome chair for the price. Decent to great quality. When you put the chair together, which is really simple, it will look like it is really low to the ground. It really isn't once you sit in it. You want something that is real and that you can brag to rich people about, then this isn't for you. You can brag to your friends about this chair if they like it, though.
customer_reviews.author: SoHonestItHurts

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller living quarters.
customer_reviews.text: I like this chair. Our living room is a little small and a big recliner would just take up too much room. This is the perfect size for us. I find it very comfortable and I like the ottoman as well.
customer_reviews.author: David P. Winters

customer_reviews.title: This is really comfortable and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This is really comfortable and easy to put together. I'm glad it was easy to put together, because it didn't come with any instructions! I still can't seem to get the two back arm rest screws to stay put. I might have them in wrong, actually. The reclining function works well, though, and the bases come off for easy moving.
customer_reviews.author: TJM

customer_reviews.title: Considering
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it can't be beat. I bought it for my dad and he's a little guy. 93 and 110 pounds. He loved it right away. Loved the swivel. Not sure he can use the recliner part, or put his legs up on the ottoman, should have thought that through better. I also should have thought through the swivel when it comes time for him to get out of it. I wished it locked as well. He almost fell trying to get out of it. I still think it is an awesome product regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Sadler

customer_reviews.title: I felt like this chair is too small for me
customer_reviews.text: You get what you paid for. I weight 150, height 5'11. The adjusting ring holding the chair to the position you wanted, broke after less than a month of uses, now if i barely move while sitting the chair will switch to either straight up or down. I felt like this chair is too small for me. Typical made in China
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a comfortable chair that would allow me to avoid the dogs if they got too excited or playful. Something comfortable that would also look good. This chair & ottoman is exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Dian Marchese

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Final Answer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my teenage son 3 years ago and haven’t had any problems. He loves it and it’s comfortable and just the right size for a bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and aesthetics
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gaming chair. My husband loves it. We got a deal on it in Amazon warehouse. It is in perfect condition, well made and very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Hello Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Comfy chair
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chair for my elderly mother it is a perfect size for her and very comfortable .She likes the fact that it’s not a big bulky chair
customer_reviews.author: Al or Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable chair, wish it had more space for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable chair, wish it had more space for my cats to sit with me. However, that’s because of the style of chair & nothing to do with quality of product. I do recommend as a comfortable 2 piece recliner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this chair to relax in after abdominal surgery. It's too low to get in and out of comfortable without having to add pillows. The reclining feature doesn't work well.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Bondurant

product_meta.title: Flash Furniture BT-7862-BK-GG Contemporary Black LeatherSoft Recliner/Ottoman with Wrapped Base
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThe Leather Recliner and Ottoman with Leather Wrapped Base gives you a great excuse to kick back and relax.Ease into this luxurious chair with its padded seat and back, integrated headrest and plush upholstered arms. A knob, conveniently located under the right arm, brings the chair to a full reclining position. The recliner features CA 117 fire retardant padding in the back, seat and armrests, upholstered in leather with a leather wrapped base. A matching ottoman completes the set.This contemporary recliner with matching ottoman is a comfortable place to spend a little quality time.
feature_bullets: Recliner and ottoman set, 27-1/4-inch width by 29 39-inch depth by 37-1/2-inch height

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars863 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
